org.jgrapes.core.internal

Interface Matchable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Channel, This
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent, Accepted, Attached, ClassChannel, Close, Closed, CompletedEvent, ConnectionEvent, Detached, Eof, Error, Event, EventBase, File, FileOpened, Handler.NO_CHANNEL, Handler.NO_EVENT, HandlingError, HandlingErrorPrinter, IOError, NamedChannel, NamedEvent, NioDispatcher, NioRegistration, NioRegistration.Completed, Opened, OpenFile, Read, Ready, Server, Start, Started, Stop, Write

    public interface Matchable
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getMatchKey()
      Returns the key used for matching.
      boolean matches(java.lang.Object criterion)
      Returns true if this Matchable's key matches the criterion provided by a handler.

    • Method Detail

      • getMatchKey

        java.lang.Object getMatchKey()
        Returns the key used for matching.
        Returns:
        the key which usually is a String, a Class or an instance of Component (for channels only)

      • matches

        boolean matches(java.lang.Object criterion)
        Returns true if this Matchable's key matches the criterion provided by a handler.
        Parameters:
        criterion - the criterion provided by the handler
